abstract: Chrysler named its next chairman on Wednesday, choosing C. Robert Kidder, the former chairman of Borden Chemical and of Duracell International, to lead its board after the automaker emerges from bankruptcy.
snippet: Chrysler named its next chairman on Wednesday, choosing C. Robert Kidder, the former chairman of Borden Chemical and of Duracell International, to lead its board after the automaker emerges from bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:29 p.m.  From Micheline Maynard, a DealBook colleague:
